00016     typedef HMODULE             CLEW_DYNLIB_HANDLE;
00017 
00018     #define CLEW_DYNLIB_OPEN    LoadLibrary
00019     #define CLEW_DYNLIB_CLOSE   FreeLibrary
00020     #define CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT  GetProcAddress
00021 #else
00022     #include <dlfcn.h>
00023     
00024     typedef void*                   CLEW_DYNLIB_HANDLE;
00025 
00026     #define CLEW_DYNLIB_OPEN(path)  dlopen(path, RTLD_NOW | RTLD_GLOBAL)
00027     #define CLEW_DYNLIB_CLOSE       dlclose
00028     #define CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT      dlsym
00029 #endif

00114 
00115 void clewExit(void)
00116 {
00117     if (module != NULL)
00118     {
00119         //  Ignore errors
00120         CLEW_DYNLIB_CLOSE(module);
00121         module = NULL;
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 int clewInit(const char* path)
00126 {
00127     int error = 0;
00128 
00129     //  Check if already initialized
00130     if (module != NULL)
00131     {
00132         return CLEW_SUCCESS;
00133     }
00134 
00135     //  Load library
00136     module = CLEW_DYNLIB_OPEN(path);
00137 
00138     //  Check for errors
00139     if (module == NULL)
00140     {
00141         return CLEW_ERROR_OPEN_FAILED;
00142     }
00143 
00144     //  Set unloading
00145     error = atexit(clewExit);
00146 
00147     if (error)
00148     {
00149         //  Failure queuing atexit, shutdown with error
00150         CLEW_DYNLIB_CLOSE(module);
00151         module = NULL;
00152 
00153         return CLEW_ERROR_ATEXIT_FAILED;
00154     }
00155 
00156     //  Determine function entry-points
00157     __clewGetPlatformIDs                = (PFNCLGETPLATFORMIDS              )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clGetPlatformIDs");
00158     __clewGetPlatformInfo               = (PFNCLGETPLATFORMINFO             )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clGetPlatformInfo");
00159     __clewGetDeviceIDs                  = (PFNCLGETDEVICEIDS                )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clGetDeviceIDs");
00160     __clewGetDeviceInfo                 = (PFNCLGETDEVICEINFO               )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clGetDeviceInfo");
00161     __clewCreateContext                 = (PFNCLCREATECONTEXT               )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clCreateContext");
00162     __clewCreateContextFromType         = (PFNCLCREATECONTEXTFROMTYPE       )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clCreateContextFromType");
00163     __clewRetainContext                 = (PFNCLRETAINCONTEXT               )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clRetainContext");
00164     __clewReleaseContext                = (PFNCLRELEASECONTEXT              )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clReleaseContext");
00165     __clewGetContextInfo                = (PFNCLGETCONTEXTINFO              )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clGetContextInfo");
00166     __clewCreateCommandQueue            = (PFNCLCREATECOMMANDQUEUE          )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clCreateCommandQueue");
00167     __clewRetainCommandQueue            = (PFNCLRETAINCOMMANDQUEUE          )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clRetainCommandQueue");
00168     __clewReleaseCommandQueue           = (PFNCLRELEASECOMMANDQUEUE         )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clReleaseCommandQueue");
00169     __clewGetCommandQueueInfo           = (PFNCLGETCOMMANDQUEUEINFO         )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clGetCommandQueueInfo");
00170 #ifdef CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_0_APIS
00171     __clewSetCommandQueueProperty       = (PFNCLSETCOMMANDQUEUEPROPERTY     )CLEW_DYNLIB_IMPORT(module, "clSetCommandQueueProperty");
00172 #endif
